title: I have loan but can pay off in 5 years I have money for hajj Is hajj mandatory on me assim al hakeem
transcript: so my question is um I'm a student in Germany and I get loans without R without RBA and I only have to pay the half back and they mandate that I can only pay the money back five years after I finish my studies and now I have enough money for HJ alhamdulillah and I'm also confident that I can save the money for the for paying the loans back uh yeah I'm confident that I can save it after H so my question is is hjj mandatory for me now the answer is yes alhamdulillah as long as you can uh pay it on time and there is no interest none whatsoever yes you go for Hajj and save within the the coming five years and you can pay them back without any problem
